title: JakeTT
author: JakeTT
content: Hey everyone, I'm struggling to choose a research proposal topic. There are so many options, and I'm feeling overwhelmed. Any advice on how to narrow down my choices and select a strong topic?

comments.author: DIN4IK
comments.body: Hi there. You can also consider hiring an editor or seeking professional help to review your work and provide constructive feedback. Remember, you're not expected to do this alone, so reach out and let others support you through this journey.
